channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 13th April
item.description:

item.title: Sunken paving stone roadway, 13th April
item.description:

item.title: Unnecessary road sign., 13th April
item.description:
This sign for a bumpy road has been lying flat down for well over a year. Needs to be taken away.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Orchard Road, Bishops Cleeve

item.title: Uneven road surface on entry to public car park, 12th April
item.description:

item.title: Long pothole, 12th April
item.description:
A long and dangerous pothole needs attention

item.title: M5 Junction 9-13, 13-9, 11th April
item.description:
I have to travel up and down this section of the M5 to get to work, the dangerous rubbish like shredded HGV tyres and large amounts of debris on the central reservation is so dangerous and has been there for months, it is so bad that I felt I had to contact you to prevent any more serious accidents
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Stoke Orchard
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Abandoned traffic cones and length of metal needs removing. They have been here for months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 108a London Road, Cheltenham

item.description:

item.title: Large pile of rubbish, 11th April
item.description:
Someone has fly tipped a large pile of what appears to be garden waste and other bulky items I’m afraid I cannot start to look at it because this is a roundabout with a motorway junction I’m very fast moving traffic
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Valiant Way, Brockworth

item.title: Abandoned car, 9th April
item.description:
Car been left behind garages for days, no owner to inspect vehicle or reply to note posted on car. Parked in private space, blocking garage access, no neighbours claiming as theirs or know whose it is.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Dryland Mews, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole/blown/raised section of road, 9th April
item.description:
On the corner of Hurcombe way and Court Road a section of the road is damaged with it being both a pothole and a raised section with sharp edges. Likely to damage wheels.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 48 Court Road, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal parking, 8th April
item.description:
Car parked in the bus stop for 10 minutes. Police passed without challenging 3 times. What constitutes illegal parking these days

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Clarence Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Sofa has been dumped, 8th April
item.description:
Someone has dumped an old sofa in the lay by on the right
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Greenway Lane, Ullenwood

item.title: Noisy drain cover in road when traffic goes over it, 8th April
item.description:
There is a drain cover outside our house in the road (100priros road) It has become loose and everytime a car is driving over it’s a really loud bang we have heavy traffic constantly and even at night which. Is causing a lot of disturbance and disruption It is even waking us in the night and early hours of the morning
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 102 Priors Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Compacted and slippery leaves, 7th April
item.description:
This stretch of footpath does not appear to have been swept/cleaned since the autumn. The dead leaves have piled up quite deep and are very mushy and slippery when wet and are fairly compacted, now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 89 Andover Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unavoidable deep pothole, 7th April
item.description:
Deep and dangerous on a corner road is only just wide enough for 2 cars so trying to go round it is very risky with it being on a corner and opposite a junction accident waiting to happen plus a few bent wheels and flat tyres!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 19 Hayden Lane, Hayden
Report on FixMyStreet
